column5: Hello, I'm wondering if any of you have had any success fishing Little Lake in Peterborough, I have heard it's good but have only caught a handfull of small ones.

Tough water. There are some to be caught though. When I lived there I saw numerous fish over 40 inches but they had seen so many lures it was certainly a tough bite. I think the only one I ever hooked was while I was bass fishing with a 4 inch jerkbait and no leader.. so unfortunately that fish got some permanent lip gear.
